title: All good
description: Comments:Great. No issues. Clean and easy UX.  We also have a complex legacy commission structure and pay out in years two and three.  Performio handles those past closed deals and commissions with ease.  WIth our last solution, my team would have at least one error per period.  Thus far, very few, minor issues, that are detected faster and resolved sooner.   That leaves the reps paid and happy!
pros: Performio is a great solution. We used a blend of homemade and SFDC systems that created a lot of labor issues around governance, disputes and automation. Items were missed, and trust is lost.
cons: Nothing as of yet.  I just wish I had more commissions in the software... but that's my issue.

title: Flexible, configurable and efficient
pros: The system is flexible, efficient and configurable which is great as it allows us (admin users) to self-tweak as much as practical which in turn means that small change requests to business rules can often be executed very quickly and with minimal fuss. On the occasions where development work or troubleshooting assistance was required, a representative was always easily reachable and turnaround times were always reasonable. The frontend Dashboard capabilities allows for the data to be presented in way that is both engaging and easy to understand. It is also accessible on any device which is very handy.
cons: There is none that I can think of at the moment

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:Peerformio fits the needs of my  job and makes it easier for me to spend time on other things without worrying about issues with Performio.
pros: I love seeing my new and renewal revenue all in one place. The commission statements are easy to read and show me exactly what I need to know.
cons: At first, we had a lot of trouble with missed opportunities and not getting paid for them. In the last 6-12 months this has drastically improved.

title: Use it for Commissions
description: Comments:amazing. always is correct and gets me paid on time
pros: Great SAAS that makes tracking commissions a breeze. As an employee of a company that uses Performio they always are correct and make sure my pay is the right amount.
cons: nothing. the software does what it is suppose to do

title: One of the good tools for compensation analysis
description: Comments:Good experience to analyse the compensation but update frequency needs a lot of improvement.
pros: Dashboard and details are pretty impactful. Ease of usage. Didn't used it for integration but looks like it's good.
cons: The delay in data display once the month ends is something that needs improvement.

title: Performio Review from a user
description: Comments:I can see where my performance falls, and the teams impact on my overall compensation, better planning, and budgeting, makes my spouse happier as well.
pros: Transparency of my statements, as well as ease of understanding. Click two buttons and you have the full report, ready for review and clarification.
cons: Speed to load at times is rough, more a function of my wi fi connection than the software itself.

title: Feedback from a user's view
pros: The feature of checking the previous month's sales data and the compensation.
cons: May be a quarterly filter along with monthly will help better

title: User
description: Comments:This has been a great tool for tracking Pay, Benefits
pros: Easy to use, easy to navigate, lots of information
cons: Nothing yet, i find everything pretty useful

title: Performio review
pros: Easy to set up and use on a regular basis.
cons: Can be difficult to find specific reports within the tool

title: Commision Checker
pros: I like that Performio is a central place to check commissions.
cons: Sometimes the deployment is a bit difficult for some account executives.

title: It's been good...
description: Comments:Overall, we are happy with Performio.  The platform have improvements to work on but the Team have been extremely helpful and supportive in understanding our business objectives.  They are investing in evolving the platform with improved functions and features.
pros: What we like most about the software is it's customizable from a box-solution.  We were stuck in a box in our previous platform and it was difficult to expand our incentives as well as our reporting.
cons: The Plan sign-off for the Users need some improvement because it's period based and lacks a pdf upload option.  From the admin side, the templates in the box solution should allow more flexibility without needing to find work arounds.

title: Easy to Navigate
description: Comments:I am able to look out how much I am getting paid out for each deal in which marketing bracket as well as where all of my accounts are at with being activated.
pros: Very easy to use and navigate through the application to view commission and the explanations behind what is being paid out.
cons: Nothing needs to be improved. I think overall it is a very well structured application.

title: Performio Review for Hudl
description: Comments:I think that performio is a great product that makes is easy for sales reps to view the commission and pay stubs they should receive, as well as keep them on track with their goals month over month
pros: Easy to use, ability to see my information from past months, multiple charts to check, and ease of use with salesforce
cons: the time that is takes for my sales to show up in performio

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:Performio instantly displays employee earned commissions.
pros: It lists features clearly and information is visually pleasing
cons: It can be a learning curve for a new learner.

title: Performio Review
pros: It is easy to use very accurate automated und transparent
cons: I do not have anything I could complain about

title: It's decent
pros: It provides the detailed dollar amount for the end commission.
cons: This does not provide a commission calculator.

title: Performio Performs!
description: Comments:Good, easy to use...like it!
pros: Easy to use, up to the minute with the latest revenue, broken down by each outlet we sell.
cons: Might be simpler to correct individual accounts and their commission percentage with a dropdown menu as opposed to typing in percentage for each.

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:When Performio was first introduced roughly three years ago, it was not nearly at the performance level that it is today.  Bugs have been fixed, reliability has improved and this has become a solid tool for our monthly commission payment facilitator.
pros: Automates our monthly commission payment process; we were mostly manual previously.  Easy to use/navigate interface.  Likely don't us it to full capacity at this point
cons: Unsure of reporting capabilities; would like to be able to ascertain an employees earning history, but it appears this can only be done by adding up each month separately.

title: Performio FOX59
description: Comments:Great for keeping track of my monthly commissions.
pros: There is a complete list of all sales for the previous month. I use this to compare to my billing. Also like that everything is archived for easy reference.
cons: In the past I have needed to clear my cache to be able to access the new month. 3rd party digital revenue is entered manually.

title: Fan of Performio!
description: Comments:I use this software daily to help track my financial goals.
pros: I like that it helps me track what I will be paid in commission.
cons: I don't have any complaints thus far and everything has been very easy to use!

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:I'm an end user and couldn't answer some of these questions correctly (compare price to other products?  Have no idea how much we pay for Performio)
pros: It's really the only software program for commission I've ever used.  It's better than pencil and paper!
cons:
I wish it would list all of my accounts in alphabetical order.   Or I could switch them by descending order.  Or ways in which I can look at my commission differently.    There is no rhyme or reason to how it is listed now and it's a very detailed, cumbersome list.  Also header is always incorrect.   
And finally, why can't our DIGAS commission be included in this report as well?

title: Territory Manager
description: Comments:i review sales trends, cusomter ordering patterns, and this helps with tracking my comp
pros: Great way to validate information and sales trends.
cons: there appears to be limitations on reviewing past data points that may be a set up from my company not your software

title: great for managers
description: Comments:Highly favorable
pros: Web based makes it easy for me and my account executives to update/confirm while on the go
cons: Signing-in can sometimes take multiple attempts.

title: Good Product
pros: Easy to use and to manage the payroll things
cons: The updates of the early beginning of the month

title: Performio - Compensation made easier
pros: It is very easy to use as it takes in the data and tells you how is your performance, it also shows you easy to understand charts depicting your performance in a quarterly manner. Also understanding your commission is so easy with performio.
cons: I have not had any issue with Performio till now.

description: Comments:Great for keeping track of my monthly commissions.
pros: There is a complete list of all sales for the previous month. I use this to compare to my billing. Also like that everything is archived for easy reference.
cons: In the past I have needed to clear my cache to be able to access the new month. 3rd party digital revenue is entered manually.

title: Fan of Performio!
description: Comments:I use this software daily to help track my financial goals.
pros: I like that it helps me track what I will be paid in commission.
cons: I don't have any complaints thus far and everything has been very easy to use!

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:I'm an end user and couldn't answer some of these questions correctly (compare price to other products?  Have no idea how much we pay for Performio)
pros: It's really the only software program for commission I've ever used.  It's better than pencil and paper!
cons:
I wish it would list all of my accounts in alphabetical order.   Or I could switch them by descending order.  Or ways in which I can look at my commission differently.    There is no rhyme or reason to how it is listed now and it's a very detailed, cumbersome list.  Also header is always incorrect.   
And finally, why can't our DIGAS commission be included in this report as well?

title: Territory Manager
description: Comments:i review sales trends, cusomter ordering patterns, and this helps with tracking my comp
pros: Great way to validate information and sales trends.
cons: there appears to be limitations on reviewing past data points that may be a set up from my company not your software

title: great for managers
description: Comments:Highly favorable
pros: Web based makes it easy for me and my account executives to update/confirm while on the go
cons: Signing-in can sometimes take multiple attempts.

title: Good Product
pros: Easy to use and to manage the payroll things
cons: The updates of the early beginning of the month

title: Performio - Compensation made easier
pros: It is very easy to use as it takes in the data and tells you how is your performance, it also shows you easy to understand charts depicting your performance in a quarterly manner. Also understanding your commission is so easy with performio.
cons: I have not had any issue with Performio till now.

title: All good
description: Comments:Great. No issues. Clean and easy UX.  We also have a complex legacy commission structure and pay out in years two and three.  Performio handles those past closed deals and commissions with ease.  WIth our last solution, my team would have at least one error per period.  Thus far, very few, minor issues, that are detected faster and resolved sooner.   That leaves the reps paid and happy!
pros: Performio is a great solution. We used a blend of homemade and SFDC systems that created a lot of labor issues around governance, disputes and automation. Items were missed, and trust is lost.
cons: Nothing as of yet.  I just wish I had more commissions in the software... but that's my issue.

title: Flexible, configurable and efficient
pros: The system is flexible, efficient and configurable which is great as it allows us (admin users) to self-tweak as much as practical which in turn means that small change requests to business rules can often be executed very quickly and with minimal fuss. On the occasions where development work or troubleshooting assistance was required, a representative was always easily reachable and turnaround times were always reasonable. The frontend Dashboard capabilities allows for the data to be presented in way that is both engaging and easy to understand. It is also accessible on any device which is very handy.
cons: There is none that I can think of at the moment

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:Peerformio fits the needs of my  job and makes it easier for me to spend time on other things without worrying about issues with Performio.
pros: I love seeing my new and renewal revenue all in one place. The commission statements are easy to read and show me exactly what I need to know.
cons: At first, we had a lot of trouble with missed opportunities and not getting paid for them. In the last 6-12 months this has drastically improved.

title: Use it for Commissions
description: Comments:amazing. always is correct and gets me paid on time
pros: Great SAAS that makes tracking commissions a breeze. As an employee of a company that uses Performio they always are correct and make sure my pay is the right amount.
cons: nothing. the software does what it is suppose to do

title: One of the good tools for compensation analysis
description: Comments:Good experience to analyse the compensation but update frequency needs a lot of improvement.
pros: Dashboard and details are pretty impactful. Ease of usage. Didn't used it for integration but looks like it's good.
cons: The delay in data display once the month ends is something that needs improvement.

title: Performio Review from a user
description: Comments:I can see where my performance falls, and the teams impact on my overall compensation, better planning, and budgeting, makes my spouse happier as well.
pros: Transparency of my statements, as well as ease of understanding. Click two buttons and you have the full report, ready for review and clarification.
cons: Speed to load at times is rough, more a function of my wi fi connection than the software itself.

title: Feedback from a user's view
pros: The feature of checking the previous month's sales data and the compensation.
cons: May be a quarterly filter along with monthly will help better

title: User
description: Comments:This has been a great tool for tracking Pay, Benefits
pros: Easy to use, easy to navigate, lots of information
cons: Nothing yet, i find everything pretty useful

title: Performio review
pros: Easy to set up and use on a regular basis.
cons: Can be difficult to find specific reports within the tool

title: Commision Checker
pros: I like that Performio is a central place to check commissions.
cons: Sometimes the deployment is a bit difficult for some account executives.

title: It's been good...
description: Comments:Overall, we are happy with Performio.  The platform have improvements to work on but the Team have been extremely helpful and supportive in understanding our business objectives.  They are investing in evolving the platform with improved functions and features.
pros: What we like most about the software is it's customizable from a box-solution.  We were stuck in a box in our previous platform and it was difficult to expand our incentives as well as our reporting.
cons: The Plan sign-off for the Users need some improvement because it's period based and lacks a pdf upload option.  From the admin side, the templates in the box solution should allow more flexibility without needing to find work arounds.

title: Easy to Navigate
description: Comments:I am able to look out how much I am getting paid out for each deal in which marketing bracket as well as where all of my accounts are at with being activated.
pros: Very easy to use and navigate through the application to view commission and the explanations behind what is being paid out.
cons: Nothing needs to be improved. I think overall it is a very well structured application.

title: Performio Review for Hudl
description: Comments:I think that performio is a great product that makes is easy for sales reps to view the commission and pay stubs they should receive, as well as keep them on track with their goals month over month
pros: Easy to use, ability to see my information from past months, multiple charts to check, and ease of use with salesforce
cons: the time that is takes for my sales to show up in performio

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:Performio instantly displays employee earned commissions.
pros: It lists features clearly and information is visually pleasing
cons: It can be a learning curve for a new learner.

title: Performio Review
pros: It is easy to use very accurate automated und transparent
cons: I do not have anything I could complain about

title: It's decent
pros: It provides the detailed dollar amount for the end commission.
cons: This does not provide a commission calculator.

title: Performio Performs!
description: Comments:Good, easy to use...like it!
pros: Easy to use, up to the minute with the latest revenue, broken down by each outlet we sell.
cons: Might be simpler to correct individual accounts and their commission percentage with a dropdown menu as opposed to typing in percentage for each.

title: Performio Review
description: Comments:When Performio was first introduced roughly three years ago, it was not nearly at the performance level that it is today.  Bugs have been fixed, reliability has improved and this has become a solid tool for our monthly commission payment facilitator.
pros: Automates our monthly commission payment process; we were mostly manual previously.  Easy to use/navigate interface.  Likely don't us it to full capacity at this point
cons: Unsure of reporting capabilities; would like to be able to ascertain an employees earning history, but it appears this can only be done by adding up each month separately.

title: Performio FOX59
description: Comments:Great for keeping track of my monthly commissions.
pros: There is a complete list of all sales for the previous month. I use this to compare to my billing. Also like that everything is archived for easy reference.
cons: In the past I have needed to clear my cache to be able to access the new month. 3rd party digital revenue is entered manually.

pros: I like that it helps me track what I will be paid in commission.
cons: I don't have any complaints thus far and everything has been very easy to use!
